column3: Social;Phnom Penh: The famous American singer Charlie Puth will appear at ------“Smart” Mega Concert at the Koh Pich Convention & Exhibition Center on the night of November 2
column4: 2018.------26-year-old Charlie Puth sang  “See You Again” in 2015
column5: which featured in the movie ” Fast and Furious 7 “.------Smart Axiata CEO Thomas Hundt said
column6: “Smart is very excited to invite celebrities to come to Cambodia to showcase our passionate customer base. On national and international music
column9: we are delighted that Charlie agreed to participate in singing his famous songs. ------Charlie Puth started his career in the music industry as a blogger on YouTube.------Thomas added: “Charlie is an example
column10: proving he has a passion for using social networks to share. Love for music and become a star
column11: he is a model for inspiring artists around the world. Actually
column12: songs like “We Do not Talk Anymore” and “Attention” are famous in Cambodia
column13: we also hope that some of the young singers in Cambodia will be able to follow his successful path. “------Past performances at the  Smart International Mega Concert have included South Korean singer CL and Rain
